entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
